errors.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support microphone access

errors.permissionDenied: Microphone access permission denied. Please allow it in your browser settings.

channel.title: Create a new channel
channel.description: Channels are where your members communicate. Create different channels for different topics.

text.label: Text Channel
text.desc: Send messages, images, GIFs, emojis, thoughts, and play with words

voice.label: Voice Channel
voice.desc: Meet via voice calls, video, and screen sharing

announcement.label: Announcement Channel
announcement.desc: Create a space for organized discussions

channel.privateChannelDescription: Only selected members and roles will be able to view this channel.
channel.channelNameMinLength: Channel name must be at least {{min}} character
channel.channelNameMaxLength: Channel name must be at most {{max}} characters

edit.title: Edit channel
edit.description: Update your channel details and settings.

general.title: General Settings
general.description: Update the name and appearance of your channel.
general.name: Channel Name

slowMode.label: Slow Mode
slowMode.description: Set a cooldown period between messages for each user.

nsfw.label: Age-Restricted Channel
nsfw.description: Users will need to confirm they are of over the legal age to view the content in this channel. Age-restricted channels are exempt from the explicit content filter.

general.topicPlaceholder: Let others know what this channel is about
general.topicMaxLength: Channel topic must be at most {{max}} characters
general.error: Failed to update settings. Please try again.

permissions.title: Permissions Settings
permissions.description: Manage roles and member permissions for this channel.
permissions.privateChannelDescription: By making a channel private, only select members and roles will be able to view this channel.

permissions.addError: Failed to add permission. Please try again.

invite.title: Invite People
invite.description: Below is a list of active invitations. You can create new ones or revoke existing invitations.

category.description: Categories help you organize your channels. Group related channels together for easy access.

permissions.title: Permissions Settings
permissions.description: Manage roles and member permissions for this category.
